title: (x) Condensed sans, commonly used on T-shirts - Franklin Gothic (customised) {Lari}
content:
The guys over at [www.t-shirtforums.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018180006/http:/www.t-shirtforums.com/ "www.t-shirtforums.com") told me i should come here to request an ID since no one knew over there. Ive tryed whatthefont but it couldt locate a correct match.

Here’s the font...

Many Thanks!

author: mjdnt22

comments.content: My guess is Franklin Gothic with filled counters.
